mapper.select: select OTPT_CD, CLNIC_NO, RCEPT_NO, PATNT_NO, OTPT_APPEAL , OTPT_HISTORY, ORIENT_TIME, ORIENT_PLACE, ORIENT_PERSON , OTPT_STM, OTPT_LTM, OTPT_ST, OTPT_DYSP, OTPT_PD , MUST_UB_RIGHT, MUST_UB_LEFT, MUST_LB_RIGHT, MUST_LB_LEFT , MAIN_CNTRVS, LNGTR_COAL, SRTPD_COAL, MUST_PLAN, MUST_ETC, MDLRT_DT from OTPT_RECORD where clnic_no = #{clnicNo}
select COUNT(OTPT_CD) from OTPT_RECORD where clnic_no = #{clnicNo}

SELECT p.patnt_no, p.patnt_nm, p.patnt_sexdstn, p.patnt_age, r.rcept_no, h.hsptlz_cd, h.hsptlz_sckrm, h.hsptlz_sckbd, c.clnic_no, c.clnic_cn, c.atfss_dt, saw.sckwnd_cd, saw.sckwnd_kr, saw.sckwnd_se FROM PATIENT p LEFT JOIN RCEPT r ON p.patnt_no = r.patnt_no LEFT JOIN HOSPITALIZATION h ON p.patnt_no = h.patnt_no LEFT JOIN CLINIC c ON r.rcept_no = c.rcept_no LEFT JOIN SICK_AND_WOUNDED saw ON c.clnic_no = saw.clnic_no WHERE c.clnic_no = #{clnicNo} AND saw.sckwnd_se = 1
select MDLRT_DT, mt.MDLRT_CD, MDLRT_NM, MDLRT_CL from MEDICAL_TREATMENT_RECORD mtr, MEDICAL_TREATMENT mt where mt.MDLRT_CD = mtr.MDLRT_CD and clnic_no = #{clnicNo} order by MDLRT_CL

SELECT COUNT(MTR.CLNIC_NO) FROM CLINIC C JOIN MEDICAL_TREATMENT_RECORD MTR ON MTR.CLNIC_NO = C.CLNIC_NO JOIN PATIENT P ON P.PATNT_NO = C.PATNT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(C.CLNIC_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{endDate}
